book.synopsis:
Perfect for the craft-oriented Little House fan!
In her beloved Little House books, Laura Ingalls Wilder tells of her pioneer childhood growing up on the American frontier. Because their resources were limited, Laura and her family had to make most of their own household items, using whatever materials were available. Now, with My Little House Crafts Book, you can share in Laura
s Little House books. With just a few simple supplies, youâ€™ll be on your way to making fun and useful pioneer crafts that you
